bibl.title: Inscriptions with the Formula yeoË xãriw k°rdow on Late Roman Amphorae. <theou charis kerdos>
bibl.note: Catalogue presented in geographical order. - See pp. 141-145: I. Egypt: 1-2. Amphorae Naqlun Inv. No. 265/86 (Doc. No. 565/86); without Reg. No. (Doc. No. 294/90); - 3. Amphora of the "spatheion" type, Alexandria Reg. No. SA 721/61; - 4-7. S.B. I, 1965; 1984a; 1984b; 1984d. - "All the amphorae were used in the 6th century to transport olive oil produced in estates belonging to monasteries (or churches)."
